description:
Compute API was refactored to take an instance instead of an instance_id.

nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py:poll_rebooting_instances is still passing an instance_id.
title: poll rebooting still passes instance id

comments.content:

nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py:poll_rebooting_instances is still passing an instance_id.
